message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $120?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll sell the product to you for $130.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm still looking to stay within my budget. Could we perhaps agree on $120?
